content:
I am a graduate student at the Institute for Logic, Language and Computation at the University of Amsterdam. My main interests are Philosophy of Logic, Philosophical Logic, (Formal) Epistemology and Philosophy of Science. I sometimes dabble into the more mathematical side of logic, mainly Homotopy Type Theory
Outside of my academic work, I am passionate about languages, history, and anime ðŸ˜ƒ

title: Horia Lixandru
